mapper.select: select * from gy_report_experimental_test order by cId desc
select cId, cExperimentName, cExperimentTime, cExperimentEnglishName,cStatu from gy_report_experimental_test where cId = #{cId}
mapper.insert: insert into gy_report_experimental_test (cId, cExperimentName, cExperimentTime, cExperimentEnglishName,cStatu) values (#{cId }, #{cExperimentName }, #{cExperimentTime }, #{cExperimentEnglishName }, #{cStatu })
mapper.update:
update gy_report_experimental_test
cExperimentName = #{cExperimentName },
cExperimentTime = #{cExperimentTime },
cExperimentEnglishName = #{cExperimentEnglishName },
cStatu = #{cStatu },
where cId = #{cId }
